author: thesps
body:
#### PR description:

This PR improves and fixes the handoff of emulated jets and MHT collections from phase 2 L1T correlator to global trigger for their emulation.
-  hardware correlator produces jets in an internal format and send them in a different agreed format. Now both are made accessible and more explicitly named
- the MHT emulator was doing some incorrect decoding of the correlator jets, then incorrect encoding of the MHT for GT, that are both now fixed
- MHT in the `L1TPFJetsTask ` was not consuming the correct collection for proper emulation of the L1T hardware, now fixed

#### PR validation:

These changes have been developed and studied in the context of the Phase 2 Global Trigger emulation and validation against the previously not-emulated Menu workflow by the L1T software team.

@aloeliger
title: L1T Phase 2: correlator-to-GT interface for jets and MHT
